name: Brevity
description:
We help B2B services / tech businesses, nonprofits, and solo entrepreneurs create attractive brochure websites that look great on all devices and entice visitors take the next step (e.g. fill out a contact form). We also train clients on how to perform basic website maintenance themselves.
All of our websites are built on the Squarespace, and Squarespace endorses us as an expert on their platform (we're the only endorsed experts in Washington, DC).
Our clients choose us because of the way we do business: efficiently, transparently, and collaboratively. We don't like to nickel-and-dime clients, and clients love being able to perform their own website edits.
